title: Agriculture in Saudi Arabia
description: This false-colour image from the Sentinel-2A satellite shows agricultural structures near Tubarjal, Saudi Arabia. Circles come from a central-pivot irrigation system, where the long water pipe rotates around a well at the centre.
theme:
FALSE – COLOR. Satellites show what human
eyes can't see
